movie_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
title: Beautiful story!
review: This movie should win much more prices. It has a great story and amazing characters.

title: nothing is perfect.
review:
But this movie is damn close to perfection.
the story is great, the cast extremely good and the way they filmed is is fantastic.

title: new classic
review: 'Green Book' is one of the best movies I have ever seen. the storie is outstanding and the actors are the best. I really enjoyed watching this movie. Other oscar nominees are long boring movies but this one kept me watching, I want to see more.
